alert.note: Alert for Hamblen; Hawkins; Jefferson; Northwest Cocke; Northwest Greene (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 1:43PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hawkins, northeastern Jefferson, northwestern Cocke, west central Greene and Hamblen Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 243 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over White Pine, or 7 miles south of Morristown, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morristown, Greeneville, White Pine, Baneberry, Russellville, Mosheim, Bulls Gap, St. Clair, Lowland and Mohawk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Hamblen; Hawkins; Jefferson; Northwest Cocke; Northwest Greene
